description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 9th level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.mKJc6hRW1UMYal3T]{Radiant Storm}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.lzBsameIpKObkUYJ]{Roaring Thunder}
